strings.AboutSummary: {appName} is your go-to place for social media downloads. zero ads, trackers, or any other creepy bullshit. simply paste a share link and you're ready to rock!
strings.EmbedBriefDescription: save content from social media without annoyances
strings.ErrorSomethingWentWrong: something went wrong and i couldn't get anything for you. you can try again, but if issue persists, please {ContactLink}.
strings.ErrorUnsupported: it seems like this service is not supported yet or your link is invalid.
strings.ErrorBrokenLink: {s} is supported, but something is wrong with your link. maybe you didn't copy it fully?
strings.ErrorNoLink: i can't guess what you want to download! please give me a link.
strings.ErrorPageRenderFail: something went wrong and page couldn't render. if it's a recurring or critical issue, please {ContactLink}. it'd be useful if you provided current commit hash ({s}) and error recreation steps. thank you in advance :D
strings.ErrorRateLimit: you're making too many requests. calm down and try again in a bit.
strings.ErrorCouldntFetch: couldn't get any info about your link. check if your link is correct and try again.
strings.ErrorLengthLimit: current length limit is {s} minutes. video that you tried to download is longer than {s} minutes. pick something else!
strings.ErrorBadFetch: an error occurred when i tried to get info about your link. are you sure it works? check if it does, and try again.
strings.ErrorCorruptedStream: this download is unfortunately corrupted. try again or try a different format and resolution.
strings.ErrorNoInternet: there's no internet or {appName} api is down. check your connection and try again.
strings.ErrorCantConnectToServiceAPI: i couldn't connect to {s} api. seems like either {s} is down or {appName} server ip got blocked. try again later.
strings.ErrorEmptyDownload: i don't see anything i could download from here. try a different link.
strings.ErrorLiveVideo: i can't look into future and download a video live of which is ongoing. wait for the stream to finish and try again!
strings.AccessibilityKeepDownloadButton: keep the download button always visible
strings.SettingsEnableDownloadPopup: ask for a way to save
strings.AccessibilityEnableDownloadPopup: ask what to do with downloads
strings.SettingsFormatDescription: select webm if you want max quality available. webm videos are usually higher quality but ios devices can't play them natively.
strings.SettingsQualityDescription: if selected resolution isn't available, closest one gets picked instead. if you want to post a youtube video on twitter, then select a combination of mp4 and 720p. twitter likes videos like that way more.
strings.DonateDescription: i don't really like crypto in its current state, but it's the only reliable way for me to receive money and pay for anything abroad.
strings.LinkGitHubIssues: >> report issues and check out the source code on github
strings.LinkGitHubChanges: >> see previous commits and contribute on github
strings.LinkDonateContact: >> let me know if currency you want to donate isn't listed
strings.NoScriptMessage: {appName} uses javascript for api requests and interactive interface. you have to allow javascript to use this site. i don't have any ads or trackers, pinky promise.
strings.DownloadPopupDescriptionIOS: because you have an ios device, you have to press and hold the download button and then select "download video" in appeared popup to save the video. this will be required for as long as apple forces safari webview upon all browser developers on ios.
strings.DownloadPopupDescription: download button opens a new tab with requested file. you can disable this popup in settings.
strings.DonateLinksDescription: donation links open in a new tab. this is the best way to donate money, if you want me to receive it directly.
strings.SettingsAudioFormatDescription: when best format is selected, you get audio in best quality available, because audio is kept in its original format. if you select anything other than that, you'll get a slightly compressed file.
strings.ErrorLengthAudioConvert: current length limit for audio conversion is {s} minutes. pick "best" format if you want to avoid limitations.
strings.SettingsAudioFullTikTokDescription: downloads original audio or sound used in video without any additional changes by the video author.
strings.ErrorCantGetID: i couldn't get the full info from the shortened link. make sure it works or try a full one.
strings.ErrorNoVideosInTweet: this tweet doesn't have videos or gifs. try another one!
strings.ImagePickerExplanationPC: right click an image to save it.
strings.ImagePickerExplanationPhone: press and hold an image to save it.
strings.ErrorNoUrlReturned: server didn't return a download link. this should never happen. reload the page and try again, but if it doesn't help, {ContactLink}.
strings.ErrorUnknownStatus: i received a response i can't process. most likely something with status is wrong. this should never happen. reload the page and try again, but if it doesn't help, {ContactLink}.
strings.FollowTwitter: follow {appName}'s twitter account for polls, updates, and more: @justusecobalt
